::Scorponok/Zarak::

Scorponok's hugs pinser arms move up and absorb most of the return fire. Scorponok's armor recieves scorches to it's surface but no significant damage. The arms move to the side and the smoke settles. Zarak stands proud apon Scorponok, laughing.

Zarak: Finally action! These Maximals will cower at the might of combined Cybertronian, Nebulan and Generation 2 technology!

The pinser arms swing back up and open, releasing two rockets each at the city. Scorponok's body mounted turrets swing around and fire at any near fliers.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                                  Upon getting the communication, Deadfur just keeps on wondering how
 his week could go worse. An uprising and now a so-called Decepticon
 attack. Pretty sure he didn't want to know just how bad it could
 really be, he decided to take action.
 
 Deadfur: All soldiers available, get to your posts! Man the turrets
 and take that bogey down! Engineering, get me some shields up! Fliers,
 hit and run: I want him so harassed he won't know where we'll hit him
 next.
 
 The fusion blast took out an industrial complex near the edge of the
 city. As a direct answer, volleys upon volleys of laser blasts flew at
 Scorponok's huge form, while formations of fliers scattered to offer
 no unified front.
 
 *******
 
 Jotunn: Airtankers, transform and fly out!
 
 The five robots transformed into five different aircrafts, Motherload
 being the largest, a cargo ship with two side-turrets. Jotunn climbed
 aboard her and ordered a formation of Predacon fliers to escort.
 
 Jotunn: Our primary objective is to take Relay as intact as possible.
 Should that objective fail... sink the city!
 
 Motherload: Direct plan... no quarters asked... and things blow up.
 Yup, I definitely like this! Airtankers, fly out! Let's show those
 pansies why we got "Tank" in our name!
 
 The squadron and its escort left in the cold arctic winds for their
 promised glory.
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Scorponok/Zarak::
 > 
 > Scorponok has tracked Maximal signals to their originating point.
 However apon arrival Zarak is confused that there is no Maximal base.
 Eventually he realizes that the Razor Wing Maximals are above in the
 city of Relay.
 > 
 > Zarak opens a comm channel.
 > 
 > Zarak: Maximals: on this day your past returns to haunt you.
 DECEPTICONS FOREVER!!!!
 > 
 > Scorponok's fusion tail blaster swings up, taking aim and releases a
 extremely powerful fusion blast at the city...
 > 
 >        
 > ---------------------------------
 > Sick sense of humor? Visit Yahoo! TV's Comedy with an Edge to see
 what's on, when.
 >

Pinpoint customers who are looking for what you sell.
